title: Nocturnal Surveillance
story: The castle's ancient stones hum with watchful malice. Every shadow conceals unseen eyes, making heroes feel perpetually hunted.
effect: While this card is active, heroes cannot perform Memory Search actions in the Library or Great Hall. Additionally, any hero ending their turn in the Entrance Hall or Blood Storage must roll a D6. On a roll of 1-3, they lose 1 Health as the castle itself seems to drain their vitality.
